import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Cart = () => { const [cartItems, setCartItems] = useState([ // Your initial cart items state here ]); const handlePlus = (cartItemId) => { const updatedCartItems = cartItems.map((item) => item.id === cartItemId ? { ...item, count: item.count + 1 } : item ); setCartItems(updatedCartItems); }; const handleMinus = (cartItemId) => { const updatedCartItems = cartItems.map((item) => item.id === cartItemId && item.count > 1 ? { ...item, count: item.count - 1 } : item ); setCartItems(updatedCartItems); }; const handleRemove = (cartItemId) => { // Implement the logic to remove an item from the cart }; return (
